mapper.select: select * from( select recruit_no, title, field, location, age, start_date, end_date,to_char(time_posted,'YYYY-MM-DD') as time_posted, content, hit, ceil(rownum/5)as page from(select recruit_no, title, field, location, age, start_date,end_date, content, time_posted, hit from(select recruit_no, title, field,location, age,start_date, end_date, content, time_posted, hit from recruit order by recruit_no desc)) where title like '%${search}%' or content like '%${search}%') where page=#{pageNo}

select * from( select board_no, board_type, title, writer, content, member_no, to_char(time_posted,'YYYY-MM-DD')as time_posted, hit, ceil(rownum/5)as page from(select board_no, board_type, title, writer, content, member_no, time_posted, hit from(select board_no, board_type, title, writer, content, member_no, time_posted, hit from board order by board_no desc) where board_type='notice') where title like '%${search}%' or writer like '%${search}%' or content like '%${search}%') where page=#{pageNo}
